reviewText: I have only completed the first three parts of this course, all taught by Prof. Allen C. Guetro, but I have found all 36 lectures to be very good or excellent.  I have learned details on early US history I didn't know and refeshed information I have long forgotten.  The lectures are 1/2 hour each, which isn't quite long enough to provide all the details I would like.  But the accompanying booklets provide references for additional reading which are very useful.

I used this DVD series with 3 of my high school aged children and it was absolutely wonderful.  I t is taught by Professor Patrick Allitt from Emory University.  He is an amazing, entertaining, interesting teacher and my children learned so much through this course. I highly recommend it!
